answers.answer: It's ok to drink soda but if thats the only thing ur drinking I can't see it being that healthy maybe add some milk or 100% juice in there and if ur getting Braxton hicks a lot u should be drinking water try flavored water if u absolutely can't stand water
Too much caffeine and sugar can hurt the baby and even cause you to get pregnancy diabetes... Talk to your doc. to make sure baby is fine and look into other not so sugary or caffeinated options.
I read too much caffeine can cause birth defects. I try to stay away from it personally for my baby's sake.

I have had 3 children an preg with my fourth. I drink a lot of pop and I have had ALL healthy babies and pregnanci. So yes your fine. I drink a bottle of water a day but its got to be almost frozen cause I hate water too.
You can buy water that has some carbonation, then add a flavoring pack to it.

Try and buy caffiene free soda if you have to drink it...obviously water is best. You mever know how some things might affect your baby. Ive heard of low birth weight with moms who drink lots of caffiene. Do your best to give your baby the healthiest start you can!

Try mio and other water flavor things. It may help. I was told due to the sugar content it would take way more soda and juice drinks to hydrate you n baby than what water would. So what if you supplement it with a flavored water??
If you just start drinking water,  it will start to taste good to you.   A little squeeze of lemon or lime is good.  Once you start the habit of drinking water,  you'll develop a taste for it.

Try drinking it cold then drinking it room temp to see what is better to you for me freezing cold water is easier to drink sometimes i put lemon juice in it and ive heard cucumbers added to water is awesome too
Ooo cucumbers are good in it. One of the spas I go to does that.
A friend of mine only drank mt dew and ended up haveing very low amniotic fluid, but happy side her daughter is a happy healthy 4 year old.

question: I've been feeling fine except these Braxton hicks that keeps coming
title: All I drink is soda I hate water is the baby still good?
